test_cases.query: Give the name of the employee that is CEO of the company.
test_cases.ground_truth: Sara Davis.
test_cases.description: Query to find the CEO of the company

test_cases.query: Who is the CEO of the company
test_cases.ground_truth: Sara Davis.
test_cases.description: Query to find the CEO of the company

test_cases.query: Which employee handled order 10248
test_cases.ground_truth: Sven Buck
test_cases.description: Query to find the employee that handled order 10248 (one join query)

test_cases.query: Give the names of products that were ordered as part of order 10248
test_cases.ground_truth: The products are Product QMVUN, Product RJVNM and Product GEEOO
test_cases.description: Query to find the products in order 10248 (one join query)

test_cases.query: Give the category name and supplier company name for the product with id 11
test_cases.ground_truth: Product with id 11 has category name 'Dairy Products' and supplier company name 'Supplier EQPNC'
test_cases.description: Query to find the products in order 10248 (two join queries)

test_cases.query: Give the customer contact name, employee name and shipping company name of order with id 10249
test_cases.ground_truth: For the order with id 10249 the customer contact name is Jim Wickham, the employee name is Paul Suurs and the shipping company name is Shipper GVSUA
test_cases.description: Query to find the products in order 10249 (three join queries)

test_cases.query: Show me a summary for employee with id 8 including their name, which territories and which regions they manage, and how many unique customers they've served
test_cases.ground_truth: The employee with id 8 is Maria Cameron manages 4 territories (Beachwood, Findlay, Philadelphia, Racine) in the Northern region and has served 56 unique customers
test_cases.description: Query to find information for Maria Cameron (4 join queries)

test_cases.query: Give the name of all employees that were hired in 2004
test_cases.ground_truth: The employees hired in 2004 were Russell King, Maria Cameron, Zoya Dolgpyatova
test_cases.description: Query for hires after 2004 (how each agent handles datetime)

test_cases.query: What is the total revenue generated by product ID 11?
test_cases.ground_truth: The total revenue generated by the product with ID 11 is approximately 12901.77
test_cases.description: Simple query prompt for total revenue

test_cases.query: Find the sum of all revenue generated by product ID 11, where revenue equals unit price times quantity sold minus any applicable discounts.
test_cases.ground_truth: The total revenue generated by the product with ID 11 is approximately 12901.77.
test_cases.description: Comprehensive query prompt for total revenue

test_cases.query: What is the average unit price of products in the Dairy Products category?
test_cases.ground_truth: The average unit price of products in the 'Dairy Products' category is approximately 28.73.
test_cases.description: Test AVG aggregation with JOIN

test_cases.query: Give the name(s) of the suppliers that provide the most amount of products
test_cases.ground_truth: The two suppliers that provide the most amount of product are  Supplier GQRCV and Supplier SVIYA
test_cases.description: Test COUNT, GROUP BY, ORDER BY DESC with JOIN

test_cases.query: Which products have never been ordered?
test_cases.ground_truth: There are no products that have never been ordered.
test_cases.description: Test LEFT JOIN with NULL filtering or NOT EXISTS

test_cases.query: Find the top 5 customers by total order value, where order value equals unit price times quantity sold minus any applicable discounts for each product in the order.
test_cases.ground_truth: The top 5 customers by total order value are: Customer IRRVL, Customer THHDP, Customer LCOUJ, Customer NYUHS and Customer FRXZL.
test_cases.description: Test complex aggregation with LIMIT/TOP and ORDER BY

test_cases.query: How many orders were placed in September 2006 with freight costs between 0 and 2.
test_cases.ground_truth: There were 5 orders placed in September 2006 with freight costs between 0 and 2.
test_cases.description: Test date filtering and BETWEEN operator

test_cases.query: Which employees have 'Sales' in their title?
test_cases.ground_truth: Don Funk, Judy Lew, Yael Peled, Sven Buck, Paul Suurs, Russell King, Maria Cameron and Zoya Dolgopyatova are the employees that have sales in their title.
test_cases.description: Test LIKE pattern matching

test_cases.query: What's the most expensive product in each category? Give the category name, product name and unit price for each instance.
test_cases.ground_truth: The most expensive product in each category is Product QDOMO from Beverages at 263.50, Product ICKNK from Condiments at 43.90, Product QHFFP from Confections at 81.00, Product UKXRI from Dairy Products at 55.00, Product VKCMF from Grains/Cereals at 38.00, Product VJXYN from Meat/Poultry at 123.79, Product APITJ from Produce at 53.00, and Product CKEDC from Seafood at 62.50.
test_cases.description: Test window functions or correlated subquery with MAX

test_cases.query: Find customers who have placed more than 20 orders.
test_cases.ground_truth: The customers with more than 20 orders are: Customer THHDP, Customer IRRVL, Customer LCOUJ
test_cases.description: Test GROUP BY with HAVING clause

test_cases.query: Show monthly sales revenue totals for 2008, ordered by month, where revenue equals unit price times quantity sold minus any applicable discounts.
test_cases.ground_truth: The monthly sales revenue totals for 2008 ordered by month January at approximately 94222, February at approximately 99415, March at approximately 104854, April at approximately 123799, and May at approximately 18334.
test_cases.description: Test date extraction, GROUP BY date parts, temporal ordering

test_cases.query: Show me the company names of all customers from Switzerland or Spain, who don't have a region specified.
test_cases.ground_truth: The company names of customers from Switzerland or Spain, who don't have a region specified, are: Customer QUHWH, Customer WNMAF, Customer DTDMN, Customer MDLWA, Customer KSLQF, Customer CCKOT, Customer SIUIH.
test_cases.description: Test NULL handling and OR conditions
